item.description:
It's the return of Providence's signature storytelling event at a special place and time. Live Bait follows the tradition of 'This American Life' and 'The Moth'. A topic is chosen each month and storytellers with something to say come on stage and tell their tale. Past topics have included All you can eat, Fruit, Pussy (seriously) and As good as it gets. The mood ranges from comic to tragic and everything in between.

This edition of Live Bait will be held in Burnside Park (the one by Kennedy Plaza). To the best of my knowledge, it's the first open air Live Bait.

The theme for this edition is "Divine Providence" Come on down, tell a story or just watch the improvisational hijinks unfold.

This edition of Live Bait is free and will feature a beer garden. Come and go anytime.

Since it's close to the weekend, we could make our way someplace Downtown after the show.

LIVE BAIT: Divine Providence
5:30pm Thursday, August 30th, 2012
Tickets: Free
Burnside Park by Kennedy Plaza, Providence, RI
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to spot
item.name: Live Bait @ Burnside Park (Kennedy Plaza)
